title: Withings adds medical-grade Sleep Diary to its tracking mat for more accurate and useful data
content:
Withings is out today with an upgrade for its customers. The new Sleep Diary feature in the Withings Health Mate app offers the ability to more accurately and consistently capture sleep data that’s easy to share with doctors and other medical professionals.

more…
